sentence_zh_TW: 在會議上，與會者被鼓勵說出自己的想法和意見。
sentence: At the meeting, participants are encouraged to ______ their thoughts and opinions.

sentence_zh_TW: 這座高樓的頂部提供了壯觀的城市全景，非常值得一遊。
sentence: The ______ of the tall building provides a spectacular view of the city, making it worth a visit.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個競賽中，選手們的目標是把分數盡量低，以獲得勝利。
sentence: In this competition, the participants aim to score as ______ as possible to win.

sentence_zh_TW: 在生活中，學習新的技能對於自我成長非常重要。
sentence: In life, it is very important to ______ new skills for personal growth.

sentence_zh_TW: 一月是新年的第一個月，象徵著新的開始和希望。
sentence: ______ is the first month of the new year, symbolizing new beginnings and hope.

sentence_zh_TW: 有些人討厭在擁擠的公共交通上花太多時間。
sentence: Some people ______ spending too much time on crowded public transportation.

sentence_zh_TW: 在傍晚的時候，這片海灘的風景總是讓人感到放鬆和愉悅。
sentence: During the ______, the view of the beach always brings a sense of relaxation and joy.

sentence_zh_TW: 這項新技術將徹底改變我們的生活方式，提高效率和便利性。
sentence: This ______ technology will revolutionize the way we live, increasing efficiency and convenience.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們將在第七十次的聚會上舉行一個盛大的慶典。

sentence_zh_TW: 當你背負重擔時，肩膀會感到很痛，這需要好好休息。
sentence: When you carry a heavy burden, your ______ can ache, which requires good rest.

sentence_zh_TW: 當你在城市中旅行時，搭乘計程車是一種方便的交通方式。
sentence: Taking a ______ is a convenient way to get around when traveling in the city.

sentence_zh_TW: 在長途飛行中，乘客很難在狹小的空間裡保持舒適地坐著。
sentence: During long flights, passengers find it difficult to remain ______ comfortably in the small space.

sentence_zh_TW: 早起可以幫助你在一天中更有效率地完成工作。
sentence: Waking up ______ can help you be more productive throughout the day.

sentence_zh_TW: 幾年前，我曾經在這個城市生活過，留下了美好的回憶。
sentence: A few years ______, I lived in this city and created wonderful memories.

sentence_zh_TW: 學會如何儲存金錢是財務穩定的關鍵。
sentence: Learning how to ______ money is key to financial stability.

sentence_zh_TW: 確保你有足夠的時間來完成所有的任務，以免感到壓力。
sentence: Make sure you have ______ time to complete all tasks to avoid feeling stressed.

sentence_zh_TW: 當你敲門時，要輕輕地進行，以免打擾到裡面的人。
sentence: When you ______ on the door, make sure to do it gently so as not to disturb the people inside.

sentence_zh_TW: 在農場裡，羊是常見的動物，經常被用於生產羊毛和肉類。
sentence: On the farm, ______ are common animals often used for producing wool and meat.

sentence_zh_TW: 胡蘿蔔是一種非常健康的蔬菜，對視力特別有益。

sentence_zh_TW: 在許多國家，十八歲被認為是成年人開始負責任的年齡。
